title: Best feel good pink Breast Cancer buys for Breast Cancer Awareness Month
text:

October is Breast Cancer Awareness month, and it’s the perfect opportunity to support those impacted by the disease, raise awareness of early signs and help raise money for the cause.

A lot of companies use the month to push their Breast Cancer Awareness products, where, with every product sold, they give a percentage to the charity.

As always, Asda have their Tickled Pink campaign, which is celebrating its 23rd year of supporting Breast Cancer Care and Breast Cancer Now, and fundraising for life-changing support and vital research for those affected by breast cancer.

Alongside a range of limited edition pink buys available to buy in Asda stores, they have a host of celebrities fronting their campaign who have been personally affected in someway by the disease, such as Carol McGiffin, Lisa Snowdon and Georgia May Foote.

Also fronting the campaign is Love Island's Dr Alex George , singer Tallia Storm and TOWIE’s Danielle Armstrong and Amber Dowding.

So if you want to do something for a good cause this month, here’s our pick of the best feel-good buys...
